description: Try our easy to follow Thai Salad With Leftover Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Leftover chicken,Vegan,Tomato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Salad With Leftover Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cm piece fresh ginger, peeled, grated
150g snow peas, trimmed, thinly sliced lengthways, blanched
1 baby cos lettuce, trimmed, leaves separated
0.5 tsp dried chilli flakes (or finely chopped fresh chilli, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: To make dressing, whisk all dressing ingredients in a jug.
Place lettuce leaves into serving bowls. Top with onion, tomato, snow peas and chicken. Drizzle with dressing and serve.
